title: Can't create discussions due to lvl
body:
How do you increase your level on these message boards?
I want to join in on the discussion on the Client Discussion Board but keep getting blocked with message like "You must be level 7 to "
Are the levels tied to you in game level? If so I am confused as i am level 30 in game.

replies.body: After posting here the boards were able to sync up your boards account with your Summoner level. I can see you as level 30 now should you should be able to post anywhere!
